ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set grouping contains concepts that represent a surgical procedure where a general and/or neuraxial anesthesia is used.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Procedure. The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a surgical procedure where general and/or neuraxial anesthesia is used.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with representing general and/or neuraxial anesthesia. Codes used are to be ICD-10-PCS, ICD-9 or SNOMED CT codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
